about_the_game:
Created by Celianna, Ancient Dungeons: Jungle is a tileset meant to create a tropical rainforest location with Aztec and Indonesian inspired temples. It is packed with lots of plants to decorate, as well as exterior and interior tiles for the temple, so you can complete your tomb exploring adventure.



Features:
Animated water auto-tiles, as well as an animated waterfall character set.
A5 floors, including packed dirt, grass and stone.
Animated tiles for doors, chests, statues, and light sources.
Complete jungle Tile B, including cliffs, plants, roots, and other natural decor.
Complete jungle Tile C, including river banks, tall trees, hanging bridge and water plants.
Complete temple Tile D, including outside of an Mayan pyramid, temple ruins and platforms.
Complete temple Tile E, including inside of the Mayan temple, altars, pottery and other decor.
